title: Mexican chicken with black beans
ingredients: ['6 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '2 (270g) jars salsa, such as Discovery', '1 large red pepper, chopped', '2 tablespoons ground cumin', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons chilli powder', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 (400g) tins black beans, rinsed and drained']
